Variables
SharpNeat.​Tasks.​BinaryThreeMultiplexer
namespace SharpNeat.Tasks.BinaryThreeMultiplexer
BinaryThreeMultiplexerEvaluator
IPhenomeEvaluator​<IBlackBox<double>>
public sealed
BinaryThreeMultiplexerEvaluator

Evaluator for the Binary 3-Multiplexer task.  One binary input selects which of two other binary inputs to output.  The correct response is the selected input's input signal (0 or 1).  Evaluation consists of querying the provided black box for all possible input combinations (2^3 = 8).

Functions
Evaluate
public FitnessInfo Evaluate(
IBlackBox<double> box
)

Evaluate the provided black box against the Binary 3-Multiplexer task, and return its fitness score.

Parameter
box
IBlackBox<double>

The black box to evaluate.

A new instance of FitnessInfo.
